channel.title: si on Magistr and Maps
channel.description: Recent content in si on Magistr and Maps

item.title: The Sight of Systems
item.description: I’ll never forget that feeling—ingesting millions of metrics into a tool like Grafana or Honeycomb for the first time. Before that, I was blind. I was guessing.

item.title: The Pain-Driven Workflow
item.description: A recent post from System Initiative, “AI is an Amplifier, Why Engineers Need Better Foundations,” got me thinking about our industry workflow. You wonder why I love what they’re building?

item.title: A dream of AI-DLC
item.description: The Genesis Engine: A Manifesto for the AI-Driven Development Lifecycle Introduction: The Old World Is Dead Saturday evening, September 20, 2025. I’m thinking about how we build.
